com.applang

Class DbAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.applang.DbAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Transactor

    public class DbAdapter
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    facilitates database access for a cost sharing system
    Author:
    lotharla
